meanings.definition: To digitally alter or manipulate a photograph using software.
meanings.sent1: She photoshops her pictures to make them look better.
meanings.sent2: He often photoshops images to remove imperfections.
meanings.sent3: The cat photoshops its own photos for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her smile photoshops the gloomy room into brightness.
meanings.sent5: Photoshops can transform a dull image into a masterpiece.

meanings.sent1: Photoshops can make a photo more beautiful.
meanings.sent2: I learned how to use photoshops for my photography projects.
meanings.sent3: The photoshops at work always bring laughter to the office.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity is a photoshops that brightens our day.
meanings.sent5: The power of photoshops lies in its ability to enhance reality.

meanings.definition: A software program used for editing and manipulating photographs.
meanings.sent1: She opened the photoshops to edit the image.

meanings.sent3: The photoshops on his computer crashed right before the deadline.

meanings.sent5: Photoshops revolutionized the way we edit pictures.
